name: Light Armor
description: Padded cloth with small mail elements at critical areas

name: Medium Armour
description: Chain mail with additional cloth padding and light metal plates at critical areas, sometimes some type of lamellar armour.

name: Heavy Armour
description: Steel Plates which protect the body all around with a chain mail vest underneath,

name: Super Heavy Armour
description: Very similar to Heavy Armor, except the steel plates used are much thicker and the protection around the joints is much more elaborate and complex.
